Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. I believe its unique features and capabilities will greatly benefit you and align with your needs or interests.

Considering the remarkable attributes and benefits this product offers, I propose a purchase price of $2000000. This figure reflects not only the cost of production but also the inherent value and potential return on investment for you.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the proposal. I am here to provide you with all the necessary information to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
